item.title: code add
item.description:
code add by RDG :
Added geoPoint element to DTD to allow the recording of Latitude and Longitude co-ords for entries.

item.title: core update
item.description:
core update by DC :
Use locationmap for resource resolution. Exposes internal stylesheets as {lm:listLocations.transform.*.*} Thanks to Philippe Perez.

item.title: core update
item.description:
core update by DC :
DTD v1.1 enables use of Common Character Entities.

item.title: core update
item.description:
core update by DC :
DTD v1.1 enables notes to have links.

item.title: core add
item.description:
core add by DC :
Added external DTD v1.0

item.title: core add
item.description:
